item.title: Digital note-taking
item.description: To think, you have to write. If you’re thinking without writing, you only think you’re thinking — Leslie Lamport, Thinking for Programmers Note-taking Important to take notes, both via hand-writing, but also digital notes. Advantages of digital notes: searchable ease of planning facilitates writing manuscripts keeping track of trials - mistakes and failures are as important as successes! Organization Organize your thoughts, links, workflows, etc. Make it easier for others to understand your thoughts, but also for yourself, when looking at that piece of research after e.
